page.title: 16AMENITIES
page.content: Although many people live in Wolverhampton there are very few public amenties,espcially those designed for children.There are a few parks,one swimming bath and a few Youth Centres but no cinemas or skating rinks.There are,however,many clubs and public houses and a Greyhound Stadium at Monmore Green, which also contains Speedway track,for adults.There are no banks or building society offices even though there are still many industries and shops. There are many parts of this area which consist of derelict land which could be used to site many of the missing amenities which are important for the social life of the inhabitants of this area
